GSD.product_version: versions from v4.14 to before v6.1.7
GSD.description:
powerpc/imc-pmu: Fix use of mutex in IRQs disabled section

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.7 by commit 424bcb570cb320d1d15238cd4c933522b90f78fa, it was introduced in version v4.14 by commit 8f95faaac56c18b32d0e23ace55417a440abdb7e. For more details please see the references link.
